pepes.title: Confident Pepe
pepes.description: You know what you're gonna code today

pepes.title: Happy Tears Pepe
pepes.description: You finally understand how to code that assignment

pepes.title: Innovative Pepe
pepes.description: You've just came up with an idea for a new pet project (the last one is not finished)

pepes.title: Pretty Pepe
pepes.description: You're the most gorgeous Pepe being in the world and you can code everything

pepes.title: Silly Pepe
pepes.description: You got rid of an error, but it caused another 10 errors

pepes.title: Satisfied Pepe
pepes.description: You've found on Stack Overflow the exact same issue as you have

pepes.title: Cute Pepe
pepes.description: You are ready to listen to the next React lecture

pepes.title: Okkk Pepe
pepes.description: You know exactly how to do the assignment

pepes.title: Really Sad Pepe
pepes.description: Your program had crashed even before you started coding

pepes.title: Smiling Pepe
pepes.description: You coded that assignment, but what was the price?

pepes.title: 'I'm not crying' Pepe
pepes.description: An error solution works for everyone except for you

pepes.title: Astonished Pepe
pepes.description: Your code compiled without errors on the first attempt

pepes.title: Chillin' Pepe
pepes.description: You're gonna code until 9pm and go to sleep

pepes.title: Cringing Pepe
pepes.description: Your screen is red because of all the errors

pepes.title: Enjoying Pepe
pepes.description: You went on a walk, knowing that there are a bunch of compilation errors waiting for you at home
